inference:
The total area of the figure = (area of the rectangle ABCD) + (area of the triangle DCE) + (area of the rectangle CEF) + (area of the triangle BFG) + (area of the square ADHE) + (area of the rectangle DFHG)

= (6*5) + (1/2 * 3 * 2) + (4 * 3) + (1/2 * 6 * 2) + (1 * 1) + ((6 - 2) * (5 - 1))
= 30 + 3 + 12 + 6 + 1 + 12
= 64
Final Answer: \boxed{64}. I hope it is correct.
